```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
```

```{r clean_dataset}
dogweights_df <- 
  read_excel("./data/dogweights_07sept2020.xlsx",
    range = "B2:F207") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(
    date = as.numeric(date),
    date = excel_numeric_to_date(date, date_system = "modern")) %>% 
  pivot_longer(raisin:gagne,
               names_to = "name",
               values_to = "lbs_oz") %>% 
  relocate(date, name, lbs_oz, std)

head(dogweights_df)
```
